name: My first ever game(Project Top Down)
name_original: My first ever game(Project Top Down)
description:
Hi this is pretty much my first game ever which was created in the unreal engine 5.

With assets that where in the marketplace since this is my first game im sorry if the performance is bad and buggy.

infos abt me:

-I'm a 14 year old german kiddo lol that loves to play and make games. I started game development about a month ago but then i stopped for a couple weeks. But 4 days ago i restarded and now i have my own game with 6 levels. Well actually its 3 levels but ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ .
